content: hey you crafter come with me to the table and watch when glue guns attack so
here I am innocently working on a craft and then suddenly BAM so here we go in a
slow motion okay wait for it boom don't tell you about my about my
super slow reflexes please just wanted to say I wasn't injured at all in the
catastrophic glue gun meltdown the sparks came out of the top of the glue
gun and didn't my hand was on the handle and didn't didn't hurt my hand so there
wasn't any kind of injury but just be just be warned I guess if you push her
glue guns too hard and do too many crafts you love to crafting too much
this could happen this was actually the first time that I've ever ever had that
happen with the glue gun so but I thought it was pretty spectacular I had
to show you guys so keep crafting and watch those glue guns
